review: Doctor treet me is very good and friendly person he was. So I give him full marks to him now I'm feeling better now

Treating my kid very friendly and gently .
Excellent experience 
Very good doctor 
I recommend him as a very good doctor .

I would suggest him for teeth braces
** ** *** **** ****** 
He is so friendly and he is explaining about how your teeth will allign

Gives appropriate treatment, he is considerate of the situation and time limits if we have any and tries to fix the problem within that time.
Very much satisfied with the treatment provided.
Treatment fee is very reasonable too, both doctors prakash and arvind are  very much keen in work.

I like that.. Dr take care of his patient so will 
And Dr  behaviour is good and his friendliness...
Not a feedback on the doctor but this is for the clinic. Despite an appointment,  the wait time is more than an hour normally.
Waiting time is so long and the doctor treatment is good but only thing is that he only available once a week

review: The appointment time will be around 1 pm, and the treatment will always be around 3 pm. Well, what is the point of having an appointment when we have to wait for 2-3 hours? The doctor has less interest in discussing issues and solutions. ** ** **** ***** ** **** ** ** **** **** ********* ** *** ***** * *

This above lines dedicated to aravind srinivas  sir .

The dentist is a doctor who is specially trained to care for teeth. When you visit for a checkup, your dentist will look at your teeth and gums to check for any problems. The dentist also wants to make sure your teeth are developing properly as you grow.
Doctor is good and talks friendly treatment is done in very good manner, treats a patient in good way

Am feel better and thanks to doctors and  co partners .am happy about doctors treatment .am also thankfull to front officer for treat the freindly .
Thanks to all.
